Dear Morries
Thank you for your note concerning Ted Allegritti# You are
correct in saying that I am always looking for people#
At the moment I have nothing available so I am forwarding your
note to the NAEB Placement Office in Urbana and will suggest
that they contact him#
My warmest regards#
Sincerely yours.
GAsap
Graydon Ausmus
President
